talk_1046:
<snd:LaughS>Then get into that light there.<sp:5:1:0> It can <clr:0000>heal
any vitality lost<clr:ffff> to gloom, just like the
rumors say.
talk_1047:
<snd:TalkPositive>That's rough. Hate to tell you, we still
haven't figured out the deal with that
<clr:0000>bright core<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>You best head to the surface.
talk_1048: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Is there really a way to amplify that light?
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>What, <sp:5:0:0>was I wrong?<sp:5:1:0> I thought for sure
you were here to help investigate this
humongous tree...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I mean, just take a look. You see the
tree's...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>glowy core<clr:ffff>-looking thing?
talk_1049:
<snd:Sad>We still don't know what's going on with
that <clr:0000>bright core<clr:ffff>.
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>That's right!<sp:5:1:0> The <clr:0000>bright core<clr:ffff> of this
gigantic tree<sp:5:0:0> has the sacred power to <clr:0000>heal
vitality lost<clr:ffff> to gloom...<sp:5:0:0>or so they say.
But when I got here, the light was weak.<sp:5:0:0>
It wasn't able to heal anything at all, until
just now.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>I was watching, you know.<sp:5:1:0> It was you.


You lit up this tree, didn't you, Link?<sp:5:0:0>
It feels like something the archenemy
of the Yiga Clan would do.
As does being fooled by my disguise!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Somehow that light is capable of <clr:0000>restoring
vitality lost to gloom<clr:ffff>...

Or so the rumor goes, anyway.<sp:5:0:0> I'm here to
find out if that's true.
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Gyah! You startled me...


Wait, what's someone else doing here?<sp:5:1:0>
Oooh...<sp:5:0:0> You must be reinforcements for
<clr:0000>investigating the tree<clr:ffff>.
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>Ah, but you know, that's not my only
mission down here.

I've been asked to approach and eliminate
the Yiga Clan's greatest foe...<sp:5:0:0> YOU!
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Look at this cleansing light...<sp:5:0:0> The rumors
were true!<sp:5:0:0> It really can <clr:0000>restore vitality lost
to gloom<clr:ffff>.
talk_1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Is there really no way we can make that
light shine brighter?
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Ah, this light...<sp:5:0:0> I've never felt anything
like it.<sp:5:0:0>

It can <clr:0000>restore vitality lost to gloom <clr:ffff>in the
blink of an eye.
talk_1052:
<snd:LaughS>It'll <clr:0000>restore whatever vitality<clr:ffff> the gloom
took out of you, just like the rumors said!
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_00>The heroic Link, <sp:5:0:0>sworn enemy of the
Yiga Clan, tricked by my simple disguise!<sp:0:4:0>It seems the stories are merely stories!
talk_1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Make it snappy. If you-know-who sees
you, he's gonna suspect something's up!
talk_1042: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you got <clr:0000>gloomed<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> go step into that light.
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Not interested in hearing me out? <sp:5:1:0>There
are all sorts of interesting rumors about
this tree here...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, <sp:5:0:0>it's not like they'll do you any good
after I've done you in.
talk_1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>What's up? Did the <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff> get you
or something?
talk_1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you've been <clr:0000>gloomed<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> you better head
straight back up to the surface.
